query:
-- Video Profiles
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS video_profiles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  video_url TEXT NOT NULL,
  video_key VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  thumbnail_url TEXT,
  duration INT,
  file_size INT,
  mime_type VARCHAR(100),
  communication_score INT,
  confidence_score INT,
  body_language_score INT,
  overall_score INT,
  analysis_data JSON,
  status ENUM('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- Multi-Platform Job Postings
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS multi_platform_postings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  job_id INT NOT NULL,
  linkedin_posted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  linkedin_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  linkedin_posted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  indeed_posted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  indeed_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  indeed_posted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  bayt_posted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  bayt_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  bayt_posted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  gulftalent_posted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  gulftalent_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  gulftalent_posted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  total_views INT DEFAULT 0,
  total_applications INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

-- Multi-Platform Job Postings
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS multi_platform_postings (
